T02D3516:163b-1: a'arya ae ka dz'a t'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3516:163b-3: 'phags ma ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3516:163b-4: 'phags ma ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3516:163b-5: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i
T02D3516:163b-6: bsam gtan gyi khang bar stan bde ba la nye
T02D3516:163b-7: bar 'dug ste / bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3516:163b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyi dang nang gi
T02D3516:163b-9: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsum
T02D3516:163b-11: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3516:163b-12: shin tu brtan pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
T02D3516:163b-13: aom zhes pa'i yi ge brjod nas /
T02D3516:163b-14: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du byas te /
T02D3516:163b-15: slar yang aam yig brjod pa de yongs su gyur ba las sna tshogs padma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3516:163b-16: de'i dbus su t'am yig las skyes pa'i padma'i snod du chu shel gyi 'od dang mtshungs pa /
T02D3516:163b-17: de'i dbus su 'od zer 'phro bas 'jig rten gyi
T02D3516:163b-18: khams mtha' yas pa snang bar mdzad pa aindra n'i
T02D3516:163b-19: la'i 'od dang ldan pa'i h'um yig rnam par bsam
T02D3516:163b-20: par bya'o // de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3516:163b-21: rin chen aindra n'i la yi //
T02D3516:163b-23: phyag bzhi 'jigs pa chen mo ste ;
T02D3516:163b-24: / dmar zhing 'jigs pa'i spyan gsum ma //
T02D3516:163b-25: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs //
T02D3516:163b-26: padma'i snod kyis rab brgyan ma //
T02D3516:163b-27: rus pa'i do shal gyis brgyan cing //
T02D3516:163b-28: gtum mo yi ni gzugs can ma //
T02D3516:163b-29: lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can //
T02D3516:163b-30: dkar 'dzin mtho zhing mkhregs pa ste //
T02D3516:163b-31: kun nas kham pa'i ral pa can ;
T02D3516:163b-32: / sprul nag rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3516:163b-33: zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs //
T02D3516:163b-34: ljags bsgril 'jigs par byed pa ste //
T02D3516:163b-35: lto ni 'phyang zhing byams chen ma //
T02D3516:163b-36: snying rjes kun tu yid khyab ma //
T02D3516:163b-37: do shal rkang gdub dpung rgyan dang //
T02D3516:163b-38: g-yer ka ska rags la sogs pas //
T02D3516:163b-39: brgyan cing gtum mo h'um mdzad ma //
T02D3516:163b-40: bdud kyi dpung chen las rgyal ma //
T02D3516:163b-41: phyag g-yon chu skyes snod bsnams ma //
T02D3516:163b-42: g-yas kyi phyag na gsor bzhin pas /
T02D3516:163b-43: bdud rnams skrag par mdzad pa yi //
T02D3516:163b-44: rdo rje dang bcas gri gug bsnams //
T02D3516:163b-45: slar yang g-yon pa'i phyag na ni //
T02D3516:163b-46: sdong bu dang bcas autpal bsnams //
T02D3516:164a-2: de ni yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D3516:164a-4: bgrang phreng rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D3516:164a-5: thod pa khrag gis gang ba'i dbus //
T02D3516:164a-6: g-yas brkyang gis ni yang dag gnas //
T02D3516:164a-7: bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D3516:164a-9: lha mo ral pa gcig ma bsam //
T02D3516:164a-10: 'phro ba'i sngags bzlas de nas ni //
T02D3516:164a-11: bsam med sngags kyi nus pa ni //
T02D3516:164a-12: phyed bcas yi ge bzhi pa yis //
T02D3516:164a-13: 'gro ba g-yo zhing dbang byed dang //
T02D3516:164a-14: 'bebs shing skrag mdzad sangs rgyas gsung //
T02D3516:164a-15: bsgrub bya'i spyi bor rkang pa dag / g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis kun nas mnan ;
T02D3516:164a-16: / de bzhin padma'i snod la bsgom //
T02D3516:164a-17: rnal 'byor sngags ni spro zhing bzla //
T02D3516:164a-18: sngags gsungs pa las dngos grub ni //
T02D3516:164a-19: yang dag lha mos rab tu rtogs //
T02D3516:164a-20: dang po me yi shing rta zhon //
T02D3516:164a-21: sa mtha' a'i yi dbyangs kyis brgyan //
T02D3516:164a-22: phyi nas zla phyed thig le yis //
T02D3516:164a-23: dbu yi steng du yang dag brgyan //
T02D3516:164a-24: gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te //
T02D3516:164a-25: 'on kyang na mtha'i gzugs kyis dbye //
T02D3516:164a-26: sa mtha' de bzhin gsum pa yang //
T02D3516:164a-27: drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3516:164a-28: sngon ma bzhin du dbu la mdzes //
T02D3516:164a-29: bzhi pa phat gyi mtha' can te //
T02D3516:164a-30: sngags pas sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
T02D3516:164a-31: hr'im tr'im h'um phat 'di bzhin zhes //
